subcommands.name: members:add EMAIL [--org ORG] [--role ROLE]
subcommands.desc: adds a new member to an org

subcommands.name: members:remove EMAIL [--org ORG]
subcommands.desc: removes a member from an org

subcommands.name: members:set NAME [--org ORG] [--role ROLE]
subcommands.desc: change role of member in org
